item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-24/#comment-9">John Ruby</a>.
Thank you for listening, John! You can download our episodes here: https://soundcloud.com/thebitcoinpodcast/episode-24-betting-on-bitcoin

In reply to John Ruby.

item.description: Would love to listen and thanks, but how can we download this?
